channel.title: Looking for staff (718)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/5triph.png[/img]
I've been developing my RSPS for about a month now, and I figured I can't do it all on my own.
[b]Server info:[/b] Matrix released 718 source/client/cache Development start: 4.18.2014
[b]Staff needed[/b] [b]X2[/b] coder (admin) [b]X2[/b] admin (ideas, bug finding) [b]X1[/b] Head moderator (ideas, bug finding) [b]X1[/b] Graphics designer
Comment in the chat or send me a PM if you're interested in joining. Keep in mind, there is no payment for this, this is just a core4fun project
The server will be a [u]non-profit[/u] server where all the money earned will go towards further development.
Money is not an issue, VPS will be paid from my personal savings.

item.title: Looking for staff (718)
item.dc:creator: @fearoscape fearoscape
item.description:
@fearoscape wrote:

hey i want you to help, i can code for you and to the website
add me on skype mvpboy1993 or reply

Read full topic

I’ve been developing my RSPS for about a month now, and I figured I can’t do it all on my own.

The server will be a non-profit server where all the money earned will go towards further development.
